info.brief_description: Zack has an interesting adventure during his first year at college
info.description:
One day, you, Zack, came home after a day of classes at the college that you and your girlfriend go to. There is a package waiting on your bed that will grant you a new twist on life and when you open it. You gain powers. You just start out with Possession and the power to go into anime's, video games, etc. but gain more during the day or weeks, you decide.

Powers:

Possession: (starting power) Allows you to possess other people thru any opening or just by phasing into them or by a simple touch.

Hyponotize: (Later as the second power) You know what this does so I don't have to explain it

Mind Control: (third power gain later) Allows you to control the minds of other people.

Blood Possess: (fourth power gain later) A power I thought of. Like possession but just a bit more easier. Focus on the person you want to possess by thinking about that person's blood type and you possessed them thru their blood stream.

Body Swap: (fifth power gain later) Allows you to swap bodies with someone

Mind Lock: (sixth power gained later) Another power I thought of and can work with possession or blood possess. Locks the person's mind into a deep sleep as their body is now a mindless shell for you to do anything with it.

Time Travel: (seventh power gained later) Only works in the anime since I kinda want this power to be used in the anime only. Allows you to travel to a different point in time.

and finally, Alter Reality: (final power to be gained) Allows you to alter people's look and stuff like that.

Main Characters:

Zack: 18 years and is in college somewhere in Miami, Florida and is living on college. His parents are divorced and moved to different states so Zack doesn't know where they are at. Zack is living on campus and is focusing on all of his classes. He is living with his girlfriend on campus since they have been together for 10 years since they started dating in 2nd grade. Zack is now 6'5 and his hair is now shoulder length.

Aelita: Now 18 as well. She is living with Zack on campus and has no parents since they killed each other during the 3 years. Aelita has long hair which is shoulder length as well. Zack and Aelita are in the same classes together and sit right next to each other. Aelita has now really cared about Zack and will do anything to be with him.

Naomi Phoenix: 19 years old and goes to the same college as Zack and Aelita to be with them since they have been best friends for 5 years. Naomi is 5'3 and has long hair that goes shortly past her shoulders and has great design for picking out clothes. She is part Chinese and doesn't know her mother at all. She is brown eyes with pink hair.

Rules:

1) Zack can't die at all

2) IF you want to add any new powers into the story then message me to get them okayed

3) Keep the main two starting powers please till later like... maybe till the 10th or 11th map line

4) Zack can't tell no one about these powers except for Aelita who knew he had possession powers

Have Fun!
